attributes.action: Safely clean up the £80 Billion stockpile of existing radioactive waste
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Industry experts estimate that it will cost £80 billion to clean up existing stockpiles of high and low radioactive nuclear waste.Every day the government sits on its hands this problem gets worse.A nuclear insider said "nuclear power was never cheap electricity as claimed because they did not take into account the huge decommissioning costs"

Not only is the stockpile ever increasing but nuclear power stations are ageing and add to the problem.Some of this waste is highly radioactive for hundreds of years and a serious danger to the whole population and it is a controversial issue what would be the best and safest option.Sitting doing nothing will not work.
